verses.verse: It is <S%G3654>actually<s%> <S%G191>reported<s%> that there <S%G3748>is<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%> as <S%G3748>is<s%> not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of you <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3588>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%>'s <S%G1135>wife<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> puffed <S%G5448>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3996>did<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G3996>mourn<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he that had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2041>deed<s%> might be taken <S%G1808>away<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%>, <S%G5613>being<s%> <S%G548>absent<s%> in <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3918>present<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, have <S%G2235>already<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> I were <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> him <S%G3588>that<s%> hath <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2716>wrought<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2716>thing<s%>,

in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, 5547, 4863 <S%G5216>ye<s%> being gathered <S%G4863>together<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1700>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> Lord2962, 5547 <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>,

to <S%G3860>deliver<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> unto <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G3639>destruction<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> may be <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

Purge <S%G1571>out<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G5600>be<s%> a <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G5445>lump<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G106>unleavened<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3957>passover<s%> also hath been <S%G2380>sacrificed<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

wherefore <S%G5620><s%> let us keep the <S%G1858>feast<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%>, <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G2549>malice<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread of <S%G1505>sincerity<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>.
I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> my <S%G1992>epistle<s%> to have <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4874>company<s%> with <S%G4205>fornicators<s%>;

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> at all <S%G3843>meaning<s%> with the <S%G4205>fornicators<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> with the <S%G4123>covetous<s%> <S%G2228>and<s%> <S%G727>extortioners<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> with <S%G1496>idolaters<s%>; <S%G1893>for<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> must ye <S%G3784>needs<s%> go <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> as it <S%G3570>is<s%>, I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to keep <S%G4874>company<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> that is named <S%G2228>a<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G1510>be<s%> <S%G2228>a<s%> <S%G4205>fornicator<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4123>covetous<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G1496>idolater<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3060>reviler<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3183>drunkard<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G727>extortioner<s%>; with such a <S%G5108>one<s%> <S%G3366>no<s%>, not to <S%G4906>eat<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> have <S%G3427>I<s%> to do with <S%G2919>judging<s%> them3588, 2532 that <S%G2532>are<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%>? <S%G2919>Do<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G2080>within<s%>?
